sections.title: Gunslinger (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Gunslinger class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Gunslingers gain proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, all firearms, and light armor.

sections.title: Gunsmith (Gunslinger)
sections.description: At 1st level, the gunslinger receives a battered starting firearm that only she can use properly and gains Gunsmithing as a bonus feat.

sections.title: Grit (Ex) (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Grit is a fluctuating resource equal to Wisdom modifier that powers deeds, regained through critical hits and killing blows with firearms.

sections.title: Deeds (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Gunslingers spend grit points to perform special combat maneuvers and abilities called deeds, with more powerful deeds unlocked at higher levels.

sections.title: Deeds of Renown (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Optional spectacular deeds that replace standard deeds, including Thundering Shot, Gruesome Parry, and Lethal Patience.

sections.title: Daring Act (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Gunslingers can regain 1 grit point by performing risky, dramatic acts with low probability of success as determined by the GM.

sections.title: Dares (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Special abilities that activate when grit reaches 0, providing benefits and new ways to regain grit points, chosen in place of bonus feats.

sections.title: Nimble (Ex) (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Starting at 2nd level, gunslingers gain an increasing dodge bonus to AC while wearing light or no armor, scaling with level.

sections.title: Bonus Feats (Gunslinger)
sections.description: At 4th level and every four levels thereafter, gunslingers gain bonus combat or grit feats.

sections.title: Gun Training (Ex) (Gunslinger)
sections.description: Starting at 5th level, gunslingers select specific firearm types to gain Dexterity modifier damage bonus and reduced misfire penalties.

sections.title: True Grit (Ex) (Gunslinger)
sections.description: At 20th level, the gunslinger can perform two chosen deeds for 1 fewer grit point (minimum 0).

sections.title: Personal Armory (Ex) (Gunslinger)
sections.description: At 20th level, gun training applies to all firearms and the damage bonus increases to 1-1/2 times Dexterity modifier.
